text: The Chevrolet El Camino is a small pickup truck produced by Chevrolet of General Motors from 1959 to 1960 and 1964 to 1987. The 1964-1977 El Camino is based on the Chevelle platform. ==Generations== ===1959–1960=== 59 El Camino.jpg|1959 ===1964–1967=== 1964 El Camino.jpg|1964 ===1968–1972=== 1972 El Camino.jpg|1972 ===1973–1977=== 1973 El camino.jpg|1973 ===1978–1987=== Chevrolet El Camino -- 03-24-2012.JPG|1982 Category:1950s automobiles Category:1960s automobiles Category:1970s automobiles Category:1980s automobiles El Camino
title: Chevrolet El Camino
